name: Alpine
postStartCommand: aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY --profile $AWS_PROFILE && aws configure set --profile $AWS_PROFILE aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_KEY --profile $AWS_PROFILE && aws configure set region $AWS_REGION --profile $AWS_PROFILE && aws configure set output 'text' --profile $AWS_PROFILE && aws configure list && tflint --init
